targets.sql: select mnode_ep,mnode_id,last(status) as status from $database.m_info group by mnode_ep, cluster_id
select last(first_ep) from $database.cluster_info group by first_ep;
select last(version) from $database.cluster_info

panels.description: MNode 被选举后经过的时长

targets.sql: select last(master_uptime) from $database.cluster_info

panels.title: Master Uptime

targets.sql: select last(expire_time) from $database.grants_info

panels.description: 企业版授权已用测点数

targets.sql: select max(timeseries_used) as used ,max(timeseries_total) as total from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s)

panels.title: Used Measuring Points

targets.sql: select last(dbs_total) from $database.cluster_info;

panels.description: 所有数据库的表数量之和

targets.sql: select last(tbs_total) from $database.cluster_info;

panels.title: Tables

targets.sql: select connections_total from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群DNode数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select dnodes_total as total,dnodes_alive as alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: DNodes

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群MNode数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select mnodes_total as total,mnodes_alive as alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: MNodes

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群 VGroups 数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select vgroups_total as total, vgroups_alive as alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: VGroups

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群 VNodes 数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select vnodes_total as total, vnodes_alive as alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: VNodes

targets.sql: select _wstart as ts, avg(dnodes_alive)/avg(dnodes_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(mnodes_alive)/avg(mnodes_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(vgroups_alive)/avg(vgroups_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(vnodes_alive)/avg(vnodes_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(timeseries_used)/avg(timeseries_total) as percent from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(timeseries_used) as used , avg(timeseries_total) as total from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, last(expire_time) as expire_time from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select ts, derivative(errors, 1s, 1) as errors from (select _wstart as ts, sum(errors) as errors from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s))
select dnode_ep, last(status) as status from $database.d_info partition by dnode_ep, cluster_id;
select last(uptime) from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to group by dnode_ep
select _wstart as ts, avg(dnodes_total) as total, avg(dnodes_alive) as alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select mnode_ep, last(role) as role from $database.m_info partition by mnode_ep, cluster_id
select _wstart as ts, avg(mnodes_total) as total, avg(mnodes_alive) as alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(req_insert_rate) as insert_rate, avg(req_insert_batch_rate) as batch_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(insert_rate) as cluster_insert_rate, avg(batch_rate) as cluster_batch_rate from (select _wstart as ts, sum(req_insert_rate) as insert_rate, sum(req_insert_batch_rate) as batch_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, sum(req_select) as req_select from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, sum(req_select) as total from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from (select _wstart as ts, sum(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(stbs_total) from $database.cluster_info
select _wstart as ts, last(tables_num) as tables_num from $database.vgroups_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, max(tables_num) as tables_num from $database.vgroups_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to partition by vgroup_id interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(uptime) as uptime from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn'
select last(has_mnode) as has_mnode from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select last(cpu_cores) as cpu_cores from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' interval ($interval)
select last(vnodes_num) as vnodes_num from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(masters) as masters from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: 当前 taosd 线程 CPU 使用率

targets.sql: select last(cpu_engine) from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: Current CPU Usage of taosd

panels.description: 当前 taosd 线程 内存 使用率

targets.sql: select last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_total) as total from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: Current Memory Usage of taosd

targets.sql: select last(disk_used) as used, last(disk_total) as total, last(disk_used) / last(disk_total) as percent from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, avg(cpu_engine) as taosd, avg(cpu_system) as system from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(mem_engine) as taosd, avg(mem_system) as system, avg(mem_total) as total from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as level0_used, avg(total) as level0_total from $database.data_dir where level = 0 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as level1_used, avg(total) as level1_total from $database.data_dir where level = 1 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as level2_used, avg(total) as level2_total from $database.data_dir where level = 2 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(used)/avg(total) as level0_percent from $database.data_dir where level = 0 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(used)/avg(total) as level1_percent from $database.data_dir where level = 1 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(used)/avg(total) as level2_percent from $database.data_dir where level = 2 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select ts, derivative(value1, 1m, 0) as level0 from (select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as value1 from $database.data_dir where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to and level = 0 interval($interval) fill(null))

select ts, derivative(value1, 1m, 0) as level1 from (select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as value1 from $database.data_dir where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to and level = 1 interval($interval) fill(null))

select ts, derivative(value1, 1m, 0) as level2 from (select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as value1 from $database.data_dir where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to and level =2 interval($interval) fill(null))

panels.title: Disk Used Increasing Rate per Minute

targets.sql: select _wstart as ts, avg(io_read_disk) as io_read_taosd, avg(io_write_disk) as io_write_taosd from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(net_in) as net_in, avg(net_out) as net_out from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: 所有普通表的个数（包括超级表的子表）

targets.sql: select last(tbs_total) as tbs_total from $database.cluster_info where first_ep = '$fqdn';

panels.title: Total Tables

targets.sql: select _wstart as ts, count(*) from $database.logs where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval (1m)
select _wstart as ts, avg(gauge) as request_in_flight from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_in_flight where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval($interval)
select last_row(gauge) as request_total from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_total
select last_row(gauge) as request_fail from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_fail
select last(gauge) as mem_percent from $database.taosadapter_system_mem_percent where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(gauge) as cpu_percent from $database.taosadapter_system_cpu_percent where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

list.name: userdb
list.query: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null

list.query: select first_ep from $database.cluster_info group by cluster_id, first_ep;
